mapper.select: select m.member_id, m.member_pwd, m.member_name, m.member_joindate, (select d_name from DETAIL_CODE where h_code='0001' and d_code=member_jointype) member_jointype, NVL(SUM(p.point_value),0) member_point from MEMBER m, POINT_INFO p where m.member_id = p.member_id(+) group by m.member_id, m.member_pwd, m.member_name, m.member_joindate, member_jointype
mapper.update: update MEMBER SET member_name=null, member_pwd=null, member_jointype='0003', member_point=0 where member_id=#{member}
mapper.select: select * from member where member_name like '%'||#{member_name}||'%' order by member_name asc
select * from member where member_jointype=#{member_jointype} order by member_name asc
select log_no, manager_id, log_date, (select d_name from DETAIL_CODE where h_code='0003' and d_code=log_code) log_code, log_content from MANAGER_LOG where manager_id=#{id} order by log_no DESC
select * from partner order by partner_no desc
select * from partner where partner_name like '%'||#{partner_name}||'%' order by partner_no desc
select * from partner where partner_yn=#{partner_yn} order by partner_no desc
mapper.update: update PARTNER SET partner_yn='Y', partner_ydate=SYSDATE where partner_no=#{partnerNo}
mapper.select: select * from COUPON c, PARTNER p where c.partner_no = p.partner_no
mapper.update: update coupon set coupon_yn='Y' where coupon_no=#{couponNo}
update coupon set coupon_yn='N' where coupon_no=#{couponNo}
mapper.select: select * from COUPON c, PARTNER p where c.partner_no = p.partner_no and c.coupon_no=#{couponNo}
select * from COUPON c, PARTNER p where c.partner_no = p.partner_no and p.partner_name like '%'||#{partner_name}||'%'
select * from COUPON c, PARTNER p where c.partner_no = p.partner_no and c.coupon_yn=#{coupon_yn}
